contents_items

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • contents_items.Items
      • contents_items.Room

  • public class Room
extends Items
    Class Room - a room in an adventure game. This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. A "Room" represents one location in the scenery of the game. It is connected to other rooms via exits. The exits are labelled north, east, south, west. For each direction, the room stores a reference to the neighbouring room, or null if there is no exit in that direction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String room_desc)
        Create a room described "description". Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard". Add a hash map of exits relevant to each room
        Parameters:
        room_desc - The room's description.

        Link a user's move from an exit to a destination room
        Parameters:

        dest_room - the room the exit connects to

        Returns:
